Name: War Battle Royale Battlegrounds
About the game: War Battle Royale Battlegrounds takes place in a cubic world! Compete against opponents on a map created to play this type of game(battle royale)Duration of the game less than 10 minutes Choose one of five characters and start the battle against opponents on the island features: Inventory system with wearable equipment, player can equip armor, helmet, backpack, or additional items. Team Deathmatch Weapon system(15 differents weapons), Melee/Gun/Grenade Maps Battle Royale Sandbox-dethmatch mode
